text: Bernard C. Whittemore (1807December 7, 1856) served as the Treasurer of Michigan. ==Early life== Whittemore was born near Rome, New York in 1807. He later moved to Pontiac, Michigan. ==Career== Whittemore served as Michigan State Treasurer from 1850 to 1854. Whittemore was a Democrat. ==Death== Whittemore died on December 7, 1856. ==References== Category:1807 births Category:1856 deaths Category:People from New York (state) Category:Politicians from Pontiac, Michigan Category:Michigan Democrats Category:State treasurers of Michigan Category:19th-century American politicians
title: Bernard C. Whittemore
